Material_Richness.Reason: The video captures a complete rafting experience with a clear beginning, middle, and end, maintaining thematic consistency throughout

Appeal.Reason: The video is engaging with smooth transitions and a focus on the rafting adventure, offering good entertainment value

Content_of_Exciting_Segments.Reason: The video includes several thrilling rafting moments that capture attention effectively

Amount_of_Waste_Footage.Reason: Minimal waste footage is present, with most scenes contributing to the overall narrative
